snippet: The Indonesian government has extended the deadline for Aceh Province to annul a bylaw that declared the banner of a former separatist movement to be the province’s official flag,
abstract: Indonesian government extends by 60 days deadline for government in Aceh Province to annul bylaw that declares banner of a former separatist movement, Free Aceh Movement, to be the province’s official flag.
lead_paragraph: The Indonesian government has extended the deadline for Aceh Province to annul a bylaw that declared the banner of a former separatist movement to be the province’s official flag,
